'''''"Tlatzacuilotl"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Tepetlisaurus Warrior: Rockbreaker Blade|text="Tlatzacuilotl" â€” Explorer of the Golden City}} while breaking the shield it makes in a single attack each time.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The player must gain at least 3 stacks in total from perfect dodging to destroy the shield in one hit. Note that the duration of the stacks are limited, and failing to trigger a perfect dodge for a long time will cause the player to lose all stacks in possession.
